name: Tiger snake
description:
20 levels of snake game

Collect apples to complete levels.

Controls:

 WASD or Arrows

Esc - pause

Music:

Marcelo Fernandez - “Pixel adventures”.  (http://www.marcelofernandezmusic.com).
